name: Potion Panik
description:
Sure, any ol' wiz kid can whip up a potion or two,  but can you do it while your lab is going completely OUT OF CONTROL?!


A / D    -  Controls the pressure valve
S             -  Dispense Potion
Click and drag to move ingredients/potion bottles.

Potionology 101: (For when our terrible tutorial fails you)

A potion is made of three elements, represented by the three coloured blobs.

Each element has TWO corresponding ingredients - one SMOOTH and one SHARP.
The ingredients are colour coded to match the elements.

SHARP ingredients make an element more spikey.
SMOOTH ingredients make an element more rounded.

Match all three elements to the ones displayed in the book, and you've got yourself a nice fresh poush ready to pour.  Just make sure there's a bottle sitting under the valve to pour it in to!

Oh, and don't forget to keep an eye on the pressure valve at all times - if the needle is outside of the green zone for too long, that's a yikes moment.

Made with love (and some hate) by Chinwizard and BBpuffs for GMTK Jam 2020.
